attributes.additional_details:
NHS Schedule 11 Prescription of Viagra to Erectile Dysfunction (ED) Patients to be abolished as Pfizer no longer hold the Patent and the cost is greatly reduced. The prescription of Viagra then to be made by GP's reducing hospital waiting lists for Urology Departments as GP's will be aware of patients suffering ED.

Then the Embarrassment men suffer will be reduced and so will Suicides and Divorce be lowered as men feel happier dealing their GP instead of numerous Urology Consultants.
